tags: to the person who reblogged another post abt him and tagged it as d/c pls don't asfadgasdsd
summary: While it’s good that Flash has a storyline again and isn’t stagnating, and his fear of becoming like his father is interesting,...
body:
While it’s good that Flash has a storyline again and isn’t stagnating, and his fear of becoming like his father is interesting, I don’t like what they’ve done to him to get here. 

He seemed to be fulfilled with his job at the youth center, helping the kids, and having him despair at it in Redemption and look for a “better” one seems offensive, for implying that people with jobs like that are failing at life and/or that Flash thinks so. 

They’ve made it so he doesn’t have any “real” friends, as though he doesn’t have Felicia (even though they broke up), Liz and Mary Jane and, most importantly, Peter. I say him most importantly 1) because they they had been shown to be close before the writers decided it that, nope, they’re not really friends, they just interact because they are part of the same friend group, nevermind the Flash was Peter’s freaking best man (when Harry was still alive and well!) and 2) because they keep making it as though they can barely stand each other and Flash keeps belittling him in his mind except when he wonders how such a geek can become a respected photographer and marry a “model” (would it have been so difficult for him to actually name Mary Jane, as in, aknowledge that she’s a good friend of his who has a lot of wonderful traits other than her beauty? Not in a “don’t point out that MJ is pretty” way, but in a “point out that Flash appreciates other things in her, because he knows her beyond her pretty face” way. It makes him seem shallow to reduce a friend to eye candy like that). They’re denying any and all development he had to backtrack to the “ex-BMOC past his prime” arc because now they have more material which would have gone well with it back when it made sense. And it sucks.

summary:
In English Class, reading Hamlet
Peter (at some point): Isn't this the plot to that movie about the lions?
Abe (rings bell out...
body:
In English Class, reading Hamlet

Peter (at some point): Isn’t this the plot to that movie about the lions?

Abe (rings bell out of nowhere): That is correct.

Michelle stares, both unamused and with hearteyes

summary: I just had a horrifying thought...
title: I just had a horrifying thought...
body:
The suit we see in Infinity war when Peter jumps out of the bus is similar to/the same suit he brought to Germany.

It isn’t the Nanotech suit from Infinity War (because you always use the most recent version of the suit).

Far From Home occurs prior to Infinity War.

Peter is really dead.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: marvelheroperil
blog.title: Marvel Superheroes in Peril
blog.description: This is a backup blog to the sideblog MarvelPeril in case it gets deactivated. This blog dedicates to Marvel superheroes falling into perilous situations such as getting captured, hurt or whatever. Note that there WON'T be any pictures of superheroes from live-action Marvel movies/TV Shows.

summary: Once they are gassed by soldiers, Spider-Man and Nighthawk are captured by a lady who tries to kill him in revenge for the past...
caption:
Once they are gassed by soldiers, Spider-Man and Nighthawk are captured by a lady who tries to kill him in revenge for the past accident. Meanwhile, Spider-Man breaks free from chains and tries to save Nighthawk while fending off the angry mob. 

- Marvel Team-Up v1 #101, 1981

tags: spider man into the spider verse
summary:
Spider-Man & Spider-Punk
Spider-Man's Full Name: Miles Morales
Partnerships: 
Gwen Stacey
Peter Parker
Team Affiliations:
The...
body:
Celebrating Black History Month

Spider-Man & Spider-Punk

Spider-Man’s Full Name: Miles Morales

Partnerships:

  • Gwen Stacey
  • Peter Parker

Team Affiliations:

  • The Champions
  • Spider-Army/Web-Warriors
  • Avengers
  • The Ultimates

Notable Aliases:

  • Kid Arachnid 
  • Spy-D 
  • Captain Universe

Abilities:

  • Superhuman strength, speed and agility
  • Ability to cling to most surfaces
  • Camouflage
  • Venom strike
  • Venom blast
  • Precognitive Spider-Sense
  • Utilizes web-shooters to shoot strong spider-web strings from wrists
  • Bio-electric energy threads produced from fingers

After Oscorp scientist Dr. Conrad Markus uses Peter Parker’s blood to recreate the formula that created Spider-Man, the Prowler (Aaron Davis) steals the formula, and in the process, one of the spiders created by Markus crawls into the Prowler’s duffel bag. Days later, the Prowler’s nephew, grade-schooler Miles Morales, is bitten by the spider during a visit to Aaron’s apartment. Morales develops superhuman abilities similar to those Peter Parker has, but does not tell his parents, Jefferson and Rio, due to his father’s distrust of superheroes, confiding only in his best friend, Ganke Lee.

Miles, who just wants a normal life, is unhappy about having these abilities, and initially nauseated at the idea of risking his life to engage in superheroics However, after witnessing Spider-Man’s death at the hands of the Green Goblin, the guilt-ridden Miles realizes he could have helped. After Ganke suggests he assume the mantle of Spider-Man, and learns from Gwen Stacy why Parker did what he did, Miles is inspired to try his hand at costumed crimefighting.

Spider-Punk’s Full Name: Hobart (Hobie) Brown

Partnerships:

  • Captain Anarchy
  • Hulk

Notable Aliases:

  • Spider-Man

Team Affiliations:

  • Spider-Army/Web-Warriors
  • Amazing Arachnids
  • Spider-Slayers
  • Superior Spider-Army (Earth-TRN588)
  • Warriors of the Great Web (Earth-001)

Abilities:

  • Superhuman strength, speed, durability, agility, stamina, reflexes/reactions, coordination, balance and endurance
  • Spider physiology: Precognitive spider-sense ability, cling to most solid surfaces and webbing ability

Teenager Hobie Brown from Earth-138 became Spider-Punk after being bitten by a spider irradiated by illegal waste dumping. Hobie declared himself a Spider-Man and began to fight for freedom alongside his new friends Captain Anarchy (Karl Morgenthau) and Hulk (Robbie Banner).

Hobie was the Leader of the Spider Army that fought against President Osborn’s regime. Hobie rallied support from the lowest classes that Osborn’s regime was aiming to stamp out in the name of America’s “strength”. Hobie defeated Osborn himself by bashing him over the head with his guitar before Brown unmasked himself to the viewing crowd.

reblog.comment:
Celebrating Black History Month

Spider-Man & Spider-Punk

Spider-Man’s Full Name: Miles Morales

Partnerships:

  • Gwen Stacey
  • Peter Parker

Team Affiliations:

  • The Champions
  • Spider-Army/Web-Warriors
  • Avengers
  • The Ultimates

Notable Aliases:

  • Kid Arachnid 
  • Spy-D 
  • Captain Universe

Abilities:

  • Superhuman strength, speed and agility
  • Ability to cling to most surfaces
  • Camouflage
  • Venom strike
  • Venom blast
  • Precognitive Spider-Sense
  • Utilizes web-shooters to shoot strong spider-web strings from wrists
  • Bio-electric energy threads produced from fingers

After Oscorp scientist Dr. Conrad Markus uses Peter Parker’s blood to recreate the formula that created Spider-Man, the Prowler (Aaron Davis) steals the formula, and in the process, one of the spiders created by Markus crawls into the Prowler’s duffel bag. Days later, the Prowler’s nephew, grade-schooler Miles Morales, is bitten by the spider during a visit to Aaron’s apartment. Morales develops superhuman abilities similar to those Peter Parker has, but does not tell his parents, Jefferson and Rio, due to his father’s distrust of superheroes, confiding only in his best friend, Ganke Lee.

Miles, who just wants a normal life, is unhappy about having these abilities, and initially nauseated at the idea of risking his life to engage in superheroics However, after witnessing Spider-Man’s death at the hands of the Green Goblin, the guilt-ridden Miles realizes he could have helped. After Ganke suggests he assume the mantle of Spider-Man, and learns from Gwen Stacy why Parker did what he did, Miles is inspired to try his hand at costumed crimefighting.

Spider-Punk’s Full Name: Hobart (Hobie) Brown

Partnerships:

  • Captain Anarchy
  • Hulk

Notable Aliases:

  • Spider-Man

Team Affiliations:

  • Spider-Army/Web-Warriors
  • Amazing Arachnids
  • Spider-Slayers
  • Superior Spider-Army (Earth-TRN588)
  • Warriors of the Great Web (Earth-001)

Abilities:

  • Superhuman strength, speed, durability, agility, stamina, reflexes/reactions, coordination, balance and endurance
  • Spider physiology: Precognitive spider-sense ability, cling to most solid surfaces and webbing ability

Teenager Hobie Brown from Earth-138 became Spider-Punk after being bitten by a spider irradiated by illegal waste dumping. Hobie declared himself a Spider-Man and began to fight for freedom alongside his new friends Captain Anarchy (Karl Morgenthau) and Hulk (Robbie Banner).

Hobie was the Leader of the Spider Army that fought against President Osborn’s regime. Hobie rallied support from the lowest classes that Osborn’s regime was aiming to stamp out in the name of America’s “strength”. Hobie defeated Osborn himself by bashing him over the head with his guitar before Brown unmasked himself to the viewing crowd.

A place to write my thoughts.

I like Marvel, DC, Harry Potter & Star Wars.

I have my specific ships and otps.

Multi-fandom

tags: this is 90% of the spiderman fans i’ve encountered
some even ship mj and felicia!?
summary:
Spider-Man fan: I ship Spidey and Black Cat.
Me: awesome! We will get along just fine, bro:)
Spider-Man fan: I also ship him and...
body:
Spider-Man fan: I ship Spidey and Black Cat.

Me: awesome! We will get along just fine, bro:)

Spider-Man fan: I also ship him and MJ.

Me: you are DEAD to me!

blog.name: maxmarvel123
blog.title: II~MaxMarvel123~II
blog.description:
Hey, how's going?
My fave staff are comic books, TV series, video games, etc.
I'm an art collector (well...kind of) who like collecting artwork fan-art, design, redesign, sketchbook, illustration and every galleries, i'm posting comic panels and pages.
I'm a Marvel fan (NOT a shitty ass MCU, a Marvel Comics fan), there's lot of comic publishers i like are DC Comics, Dark Horse Comics, Valiant Comics, Image Comics, etc etc etc!
As in 2018, my blog is now "sensitive content" because Tumblr didn't like my stuff. Yeah....kiss my fucking coconuts @staff
